verses.verse: Hear, <S%H8085><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> my righteous <S%H6664><s%> plea; <S%H7440><s%> <S%H7181><s%> Give ear <S%H238><s%> to my prayer, <S%H8605><s%> that doesn't <S%H3808><s%> go out of deceitful <S%H4820><s%> lips. <S%H8193><s%>
Let my sentence <S%H4941><s%> come forth <S%H3318><s%> from your presence. <S%H6440><s%> Let your eyes <S%H5869><s%> look <S%H2372><s%> on equity. <S%H4339><s%>

You have proved <S%H974><s%> my heart. <S%H3820><s%> You have visited <S%H6485><s%> me in the night. <S%H3915><s%> You have tried <S%H6884><s%> me, <S%H4672><s%> and found nothing. <S%H2161><s%> I have resolved that my mouth <S%H6310><s%> shall not disobey. <S%H5674><s%>
As for the works <S%H6468><s%> of men, <S%H120><s%> by the word <S%H1697><s%> of your lips, <S%H8193><s%> I have kept <S%H8104><s%> myself from the ways <S%H734><s%> of the violent. <S%H6530><s%>
My steps <S%H838><s%> have held fast <S%H8551><s%> to your paths. <S%H4570><s%> My feet <S%H6471><s%> have not slipped. <S%H4131><s%>
I have called <S%H7121><s%> on you, <S%H6030><s%> for you will answer me, <S%H410><s%> God. Turn <S%H5186><s%> your ear <S%H241><s%> to me. <S%H8085><s%> Hear my speech. <S%H565><s%>
Show your marvelous <S%H6395><s%> loving kindness, <S%H2617><s%> you who save <S%H3467><s%> those who take refuge <S%H2620><s%> by your right hand <S%H3225><s%> from their enemies. <S%H6965><s%>
Keep <S%H8104><s%> me as the apple <S%H380><s%> of your eye. <S%H1323><s%> Hide <S%H5641><s%> me under the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of your wings, <S%H3671><s%>
from <S%H6440><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> who <S%H2098><s%> oppress <S%H7703><s%> me, <S%H5315><s%> my deadly enemies, <S%H341><s%> who surround me. <S%H5362><s%>
They close <S%H5462><s%> up their callous <S%H2459><s%> hearts. <S%H6310><s%> With their mouth they speak <S%H1696><s%> proudly. <S%H1348><s%>
They have now surrounded <S%H5437><s%> us in our steps. <S%H838><s%> They set <S%H7896><s%> their eyes <S%H5869><s%> to cast us down <S%H5186><s%> to the earth. <S%H776><s%>
He is like <S%H1825><s%> a lion <S%H738><s%> that is greedy <S%H3700><s%> of his prey, <S%H2963><s%> as it were a young lion <S%H3715><s%> lurking <S%H3427><s%> in secret places. <S%H4565><s%>

Arise, <S%H6965><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> confront <S%H3068><s%> him. <S%H6440><s%> Cast him down. <S%H3766><s%> Deliver <S%H6403><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from the wicked <S%H7563><s%> by your sword; <S%H2719><s%>

from men <S%H4962><s%> by your hand, <S%H3027><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> from men <S%H4962><s%> of the world, <S%H2465><s%> whose portion <S%H2506><s%> is in this life. <S%H2416><s%> You fill <S%H4390><s%> the belly <S%H990><s%> of your cherished <S%H6840><s%> ones. <S%H1121><s%> Your sons have plenty, <S%H7646><s%> and they store <S%H3240><s%> up wealth <S%H3499><s%> for their children. <S%H5768><s%>
As for me, <S%H2372><s%> I shall see your face <S%H6440><s%> in righteousness. <S%H6664><s%> I shall be satisfied, <S%H7646><s%> when I awake, <S%H6974><s%> with seeing your form. <S%H8544><s%>
